name: Tumblr Galaxy Nebula dashboard ~ c2
description: "You can choose the background, post color/transparency and text color."
additional_info: "For the "Posts' background color and transparency", go here: http://www.css3maker.com/css-3-rgba.html , select your color/opacity and copy/paste what's in the parentheses (parentheses included)" A 28 Oct 2015 snapshot of style 98771 (CC BY-NC) by Citrunade. The default background is Tyler Young's "The Ghost Nebula". Tyler Photoshopped an OS X wallpaper that he found on Wesley's role-playing forum. Tyler, Apple, and Wesley all claim copyright, so here's hoping that they're never in the same bar at the same time.

style_settings.label: Posts' background color and transparency (if you have trouble read notes below)
